mapper.select: select blog_id, title from blog order by update_time desc limit #{size}
select blog_id, title, first_picture, create_time from blog order by rand() limit #{size}

select b.blog_id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.content_id, b.description, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.top, b.comment_enable, c.category_id, c.category_name from blog_tag bt join blog b on b.blog_id = bt.blog_id join category c on c.category_id = b.category_id where bt.tag_id = #{tagId} order by b.top desc, b.update_time desc

select b.blog_id, b.title, c.text contentText from blog b join content c on b.content_id = c.content_id
where b.title like #{query} or c.text like #{query}
select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m') yearMonth from blog group by yearMonth order by yearMonth desc
select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m') yearMonth, blog_id, title, day(create_time) day from blog order by create_time desc

select b.blog_id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.description, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.top, b.comment_enable, c.category_id, c.category_name, temp.tagList from blog b join category c on b.category_id = c.category_id join (select blog_id, group_concat(tag_id) tagList from blog_tag group by blog_id) temp on temp.blog_id = b.blog_id where date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{param2} order by b.top desc, b.create_time desc

select b.blog_id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.description, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.top, b.comment_enable, c.category_id, c.category_name, temp.tagList from blog b join category c on b.category_id = c.category_id join (select blog_id, group_concat(tag_id) tagList from blog_tag group by blog_id) temp on temp.blog_id = b.blog_id
and c.category_id = #{categoryId}
and b.blog_id in (select blog_id from blog_tag where tag_id = #{tagId})
order by b.top desc, b.create_time desc

select tag_id, tag_name from tag where tag_id in
#{item}

select b.blog_id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.content_id, b.description, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.top, b.comment_enable, b.category_id, c1.category_name, c2.content_id, c2.text, temp.tagList from blog b join category c1 on b.category_id = c1.category_id join content c2 on b.content_id = c2.content_id join (select blog_id, group_concat(tag_id) tagList from blog_tag group by blog_id) temp on temp.blog_id = b.blog_id where b.blog_id = #{blogId}

select b.blog_id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.description, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.top, b.comment_enable, c.category_id, c.category_name, temp.tagList from blog b join category c on b.category_id = c.category_id join (select blog_id, group_concat(tag_id) tagList from blog_tag group by blog_id) temp on temp.blog_id = b.blog_id
and c.category_id = #{query.categoryId}
and b.title like concat('%',#{query.title},'%')
order by b.create_time desc
